actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title title 39, United States Code, to permit the mailing of tickets and other material in connection with lotteries conducted by State agencies or by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.

summary.text: Permits the mailing of tickets and other material in connection with lotteries conducted by State agencies or by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law to any place within such State or from that State to any State permitting lotteries.

titles.title: A bill to amend title title 39, United States Code, to permit the mailing of tickets and other material in connection with lotteries conducted by State agencies or by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.
